bookAuthors: Astrid Lindgren, Florence Lamborn, Louis S. Glanzman
Plot: Tommy and his sister Annika have a new neighbor, and her name is Pippi Longstocking. She has crazy red pigtails, no parents to tell her what to do, a horse that lives on her porch, and a flair for the outrageous that seems to lead to one adventure after another! --back cover
Characters: Tommy Settergren, Pippi Långstrump, Annika Gannec, Mrs. Settergren, Mr. Nilsson the monkey
